subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: When Freddy Adu arrived at D.C. United in 2004 at 14, the number he had worn on his jersey as long as he had played soccer was already taken. But now he has it back.
snippet: When Freddy Adu arrived at D.C. United in 2004 at 14, the number he had worn on his jersey as long as he had played soccer was already taken. But now he has it back.
